nodes.name: ERC20Basic

nodes.documentation: @title ERC20 interface
nodes.name: ERC20
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

nodes.documentation:
@title Basic token
@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.
nodes.name: BasicToken
transfer
balanceOf
RefundVault
StandardToken
transferFrom
approve
allowance

nodes.documentation:
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment
allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until
the first transaction is mined)
From MonolithDAO Token.sol
nodes.name: increaseApproval

nodes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Modified contract for managing a token crowdsale.
ApplauseCashCrowdsale have pre-sale and main sale periods,
where investors can make token purchases and the crowdsale will assign
them tokens based on a token per ETH rate and the system of bonuses.
Funds collected are forwarded to a wallet as they arrive.
pre-sale and main sale periods both have caps defined in tokens.
nodes.name: ApplauseCashCrowdsale
TokenPurchase
